Plot: Following the death of his mother a thirty-year old man decides to leave his father's house and live independently. Soon he has a cat as well. When he soon receives surprising news he is ...
Title: If Cats Disappeared from the World
Writer: Genki Kawamura (based on the novel by), Yoshikazu Okada (screenplay)
Actors: Gaku Hamada, Mieko Harada, Anna Ishii, Aoi Miyazaki
